title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to "It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia" star Rob McElhenney about his new venture as owner of a soccer team in Wales. Bills Wide Receiver Stefon Diggs calls in to discuss their Week 1 game against the Rams and his relationship with his brother Trevon, Cowboys Cornerback. ESPN College Football Analyst Greg McElroy shares whether he agrees with the hype surrounding Florida QB Anthony Richardson.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to "It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia" star Rob McElhenney about his new venture as owner of a soccer team in Wales. Bills Wide Receiver Stefon Diggs calls in to discuss their Week 1 game against the Rams and his relationship with his brother Trevon, Cowboys Cornerback. ESPN College Football Analyst Greg McElroy shares whether he agrees with the hype surrounding Florida QB Anthony Richardson.
